info.+content: Los Peleadores de la Batalla Bakugan
爆丸バトルブローラーズ

Mysterious cards appear in front of the children of the world, with the powers to summon monsters from an alternate dimension. When card-fighting group Battle Brothers Dan unleashes the power of Drago card in battle, he's sucked into an alternate dimension causing a break in the balance of both worlds and possibilty the end to all humanity.
"Number One Battle Brawlers" by Psychic Lover
#2: "ブッちぎり∞ジェネレーション (Bucchigiri Infinte Generation)" by Psychic Lover
